Email_1.Body:
Wow! Great job on the Pipeline and Desktop
    simulation! Only a handful of first-timers get
    a perfect score.
            
    Well, on to business matters. You are going to
    perform a real Pipeline Extraction. We suspect
    that there is a person in possession of
    illegal items and it will be your job to find them.
            
    Good luck, I know you will do fine.

Email_2.Body:
Heh. A perfect score. I scored a perfect score
    on my first simulation run as well. Well, good
    luck on the real Pipeline Extraction.
